## style() function

Applies a key/value map of styles to a selection. Use truthy to apply or falsey to remove Can be used with d3 selection.call to chain. \* https://github.com/d3/d3-selection\#selection\_style

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function style(selection: Selection<Element, any, Element, any>, styles?: {
    [key: string]: any;
}): Selection<Element, any, Element, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selection | Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt; | the d3 selection |
|  styles | { \[key: string\]: any; } | <i>(Optional)</i> the styles |

<b>Returns:</b>

Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt;
